Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg

Class FluentNode

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg.Node
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg.FormulaNode
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg.FluentNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
CostSet, Countable, Serializable, Iterable<CostSet.Entry>
Direct Known Subclasses:
NominalFluentNode, NumericFluentNode
public abstract class FluentNode extends FormulaNode
A cost set node representing a fluent, a feature of a state that can have one of several values.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware

  • Method Details

    • setCost

      public boolean setCost(Value value, double cost)
      Sets the cost of this node's fluent having the given value. The value's cost will only be updated if the given cost is less than the current cost of that value.
      Parameters:
      value - a value that the fluent can now have
      cost - the cost of the fluent having that value
      Returns:
      true if the cost of that value was updated, or false if this node's state did not change
